q_ch: 剩余库存为零的材料有哪些，列出材料名字？
q_en: What are the materials with zero remaining inventory and list their names?
gt:
Sure thing! Here are the materials with zero remaining inventory:

| ID  | Material Name              |
|-----|----------------------------|
| 2   | Fabric Pieces              |
| 4   | Wool Pieces                |
| 6   | Silk Pieces                |
| 8   | Leather Pieces             |
| 10  | Synthetic Fiber Pieces     |
| 12  | Denim Fabric Pieces        |

Looks like these materials are all out of stock! 🏭📦 If you need more info, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name FROM materials m JOIN warehouse_material wm ON m.id = wm.material_id WHERE wm.left_number = 0;
steps.description: Retrieve the material IDs and names for materials with zero remaining inventory
